High income of flexible currency management
Click the button to indicate that you agree
Call the project party and community users to enjoy multiple benefits from community development.

What is the currency swap service? 
 we usually use the order matching mode of trading platform to exchange different tokens. The user needs to recharge the token to the trading platform, and then register the order through the corresponding transaction pair. If there is no transaction pair, it needs to carry out multiple bill listing before exchange. The flash cash service does not need to recharge the token to the trading platform in advance. It only needs to select the corresponding token in the wallet to complete the exchange. 
How to determine the price of the exchange service? 
 in the process of exchange, the system will select the best trading price from nearly 30 exchanges such as huanbi and okex. Because it takes a certain time for the wallet to be transferred out to confirm the exchange, there is a certain deviation in the final exchange price. 
What are the expenses in the exchange process? 
 in the whole process, the cost of consumption includes the miner's fee that you may need to consume when you transfer out of the public chain, the handling fee generated by the exchange process system, and the final fee composition required to exchange the token from the exchange. 
What should I do if something goes wrong in the exchange process? 
1. Please confirm your transfer out address and transfer in address several times before confirming the exchange. As the final result will be recorded on the chain, once the order is completed, no modification can be made. 
2. In case of exchange failure, token will be transferred back to your transfer out address. 
3. At the same time, if you do not arrive at your wallet for a long time or you have questions, you can click to enter the order details and contact the customer service staff.

1. Please do not recharge any currency assets not under trc20 agreement to the above address, otherwise the assets will not be recovered. 
2. After recharging to the above address, you need to confirm the whole network node, and receive the account after 12 network confirmation. 
3. Your recharge address will not change frequently and can be recharged repeatedly. If there is any change, we will try our best to inform you through website announcement or email. 
Please make sure that the computer and browser are secure to prevent information from being tampered with or leaked.
